Javafe API

JavaFE, the Java front-end is a lexer and parser for Java 1.4 source code and Java 1.5+ bytecode.

See:

Other Packages
javafe  
junitutils  

 

JavaFE, the Java front-end is a lexer and parser for Java 1.4 source code and Java 1.5+ bytecode. It is used as the compiler foundation for a number of tools including ESC/Java2.

by Joseph R. Kiniry <kiniry@acm.org>
